app_detail:
Emoji background photo editor lets you edit your pictures to make them looks super kawaii and cute with thousand of emoji (light crown, dog face, heart face, sweet face...) and emoticons (hear emoji, peach and more)
in this app, you can make your picture look cute by adding a sticker emoji, frame emoji, emojis himself, filters and ability to add text.

Emoji Background section: select between more than 50 emoji backgrounds, the best and cute one to add it to your picture and start erasing the unwanted part of emoji background
with Undo and Redo feature you can return to your previous progress without losing it, also you can switch between the size of eraser tool to erase the emoji background part in a precise manner, with Unease feature you can redraw the previous emoji background part you have erased it before.


Emoji section: thousand of emoji and emoticons in this section select your favorite one and drag it everywhere you want.

Emoji Stickers: big collection of emoji & emoticons stickers to customize your emoji background you want.

Emoji Frames: between 10 emoji frame select your favorite one and add it to your emoji wallpapers

Filters: more than 18 filters to customize your emoji background

Text: multiple color & 25 text fonts to customize your text stickers

In the Emoji background Photo editor, we added a wallpapers section it has a thousand of HD & 4K emoji wallpapers & emoji backgrounds to make your phone look great
you can save and set as home screen or look screen any emoji & emoticon wallpapers you like with easy way.



â˜… Feature of Emoji background sticker : 

- Bug collection of Emoji backgrounds 
- Erase tools
- Emoji & emoticons
- Emoji stickers
- HD Emoji backgrounds and emoticon wallpapers
- Emoji frame
- Cute Design 
- Kawaii UI
- Amazing photo FX filter
- Save emoji wallpapers
- Vaporwave photo editor
- glitch photo editor
- aesthetic photo editor
- Share your photographer with friends through social networking




â˜… Content of Emoji background sticker

- Emoji backgrounds
- Emoji stickers
- Emoji & Emoticons
- Emoji Frames
- Text emoji
- Filters
- vaporwave
- aesthetic
- Emoji backgrounds
- become a famous face on social network
- Emoji wallpapers
- More than 30++ Emoji background, Heart Crown sticker, cat face sticker, dog face sticker, and rainbow effects

â˜… Emoji Background Photo Editor app is the perfect choice to become a famous face on social network
